newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: NWE oil products mixed, fuel oil loses support.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products mixed, fuel oil loses support.

text.p: NWE oil products were steady to soft on Friday morning, fuel oil weakening as trader support disappeared, dealers said.

High sulphur fuel oil barges were offered at $89 fob ARA, some $2 lower than on Thursday as the trading house that has propped up the market appeared to have concluded its buying blitz. Bids were around $86/$87.

Heating oil barges were barely changed with the IPE screen stable and barely any interest in prompt physical trade. Offers began at around IPE April -$1.50 fob ARA, but few held out hope of deals at that level.
